Here is the _tentative_ outline and schedule for the training. Feel free to make suggestion on how to improve it.

```{r echo=FALSE,message=FALSE,results="asis",warning=FALSE}
library(huxtable)
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(stringr)
options(knitr.kable.NA="")
mklinks <- function(x, dir="docs", prefix="",extension=".html",raw=FALSE) {
    sapply(strsplit(as.character(x),";"),
           function(y) {
               if (all(is.na(y))) return(NA)
               if (!raw) {
                   paste(sprintf("[%s](%s/%s%s.%s)",y,dir,prefix,y,extension),
                         collapse=";")
               } else {
                   y
               }
           })
}

dd <- (read_csv("admin/schedule.csv")
	%>% mutate(across(c(assignments,handouts,recordings),~mklinks(., raw=TRUE)))
	%>% hux()
	%>% print_html(max_width=1000) 
)
dd
```
